message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value of assets held for sale in the ordinary course of business, which typically refers to inventory.

Looking at the balance sheet, I can see the "Inventory" line item, which represents goods held for sale or in the process of being produced for sale.

The initial value of Inventory as of 2023-12-31 is listed as 0.00.
The end value of Inventory as of 2024-02-05 is listed as 343000.00.

These are the values I need to extract for the solution.

```json
{"solution": {'initial value': '0.00', 'end value': '343000.00'}}
```
